name: Facebook Tagger Processor
description: Returns a subset of provided keywords that are found in a message, and a subset of provided users that are author or recipient of the message.

parameters.name: object_field
parameters.description: The name of the field in which the Facebook object is.

parameters.name: users
parameters.description: The users to be filtered for who is relevant to a message, that is the author and the recipient.

parameters.name: user_tag_field
parameters.description: Define which field is used to retrieve user tags from. Usually it is either 'name', or 'id', or left empty. Leave empty to get at most those strings matching the above users list, which could be a mix of names and ids. Otherwise, get the value of this user tag field of those matching users. For example one could match them by id (put the ids in the above list), and then tag them by name (put 'name' here).

parameters.name: exclude_on_none
parameters.description: Exclude messages which do not match any filter.
